1.content:
Dove Cameron a 13 old year little girl is chilling in her room when her door bursts open and she see her mom standing at the inside the door way holding her report card "young lady what is this i'm looking at you got all F's on your report card care to explain" dove gets up and walks towards her mom and looks at her report card and says "this have be a mistake i did all my homework on time and i didn't miss any assignments" her mom looked at her and said "i called your school to confirm and they said its really what am i going to do about this i wonder" giving dove an evil smile and then said "well there's only one sure way this wont happen again and that's means im gonna have to spank that naughty little bottom of yours" dove starts to back away remembering her last spanking didn't go to good.

Dove was wearing a cute little sun dress that just reached her knees. dove's mom Bonnie starts to walk up to her singing a song dove knows to well its a song that her mom sing every time dove was about to be spanked. "it's spanking time spanking time, my little girl been bad time" Bonnie sang as she got closer to her daughter please mommy don't spank me dove begged and cried but her mother grabbed her arm and dragged her to the bed side. Bonnie sat down and pulled dove over her lap and pulled up the bottom part of her dress revealing her white panties and cute little butt "what do we say before getting spanked" Bonnie ask dove while rubbing her butt a little dove then says "thank you for the spanking im about to receive please spank me till i've learn my lesson" then dove feels her mothers head come down on her back side hard
